description: Distribution-based Optimizers Sweep with Fixed Anchor

commands.name: Seed 1
commands.command: python evo_trainer.py --dataset cifar10 --sampler inverse --arch lenet --optimizer GA --d 128 --popsize 32 --epochs 200 --ea_std 0.1 --bus none --criterion ce --ws hard --wd 5e-4
